resources.string: This is the main screen, with 6 different options to choose. They are random playlists, according to your mood. The source could be any kind of platform as Spotify, lastfm, or many others.\nSo each category is linked to a new activity that will gather a random playlist related to your mood.

This is the playlist screen, with a list of random artists and songs that will be played automatically by the order of the list. The user can click on the plus sign, and the app will go to the artist profile. If the user clicks on the album cover, or the phone gets locked, the playingnow screen will show up. The heart is to mark it as favourite song.
This screen shows a big picture of the artist, and details of the song, including menus to navigate to the rest of the screens.
This is the Artist profile screen, with all the artist information.

This is the Music Store Screen, where you can buy songs. You can search for the artist, or choosing one from the playlists.Click on the artist from the list, and the layout for the payment appears on the botton. There is also a menu to navigate to the rest of the screens.
Want to know more about this artist? (+)
Chuck Berry\nOne dozen Berrys\nMy Sweet Berry
No Doubt\nTragic Kingdom\nI was the girl
Peter Gabriel\nPeter Gabriel\nDigging in the dirt
Joy Division\nJoy\nLove will tear us apart
